description: Bye, Bye Miss American Pie and hello to Andres. Even through those sunglasses you could see the bad boy look in his eyes. There's no missing that devilish ?I've got something you want? smile either. That smile is there for several good reasons! What's not to like about this smooth, tight bodied little hottie with a creamy white bubble butt and a hard young dick that never goes down.He sure loved being in front of the camera and the lens loved him right back. Even though he's only 18, he's already been having sex for ten years and that sure worked to our advantage.I knew just jacking off while being filmed would be too tame for him and quickly learned he preferred apple flavor to anything vanilla. He works that pie as well as his fist and ends up covering the top with his special homemade frosting. From the fingerfull he takes afterwards, perhaps I was wrong. From the look on his face as he licks his fingers clean, maybe he doesn't mind the taste of vanilla after all. Bon Appetit!
title: Cutie Pie, Scene #01
